command.send.message.description: Sends an anonymous message to an user.
command.send.message.to: Send to who? (Must be in the member list)
command.link.description: Let people know your inbox is open.
command.link.title: A custom title for your inbox.
error.title: Error!
error.inbox_closed: {0} doesn't have their TBH inbox enabled.
error.private_message_only: This command can only be used in the bot's DMs.
error.no_app:
The user doesn't have TBH added as an app.
Tell them to add it!
App link: https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=1315828152785698869
error.unknown: I'm not entirely sure what I did wrong, but I clearly did something wrong :[
success.title: Success!
embed.link.title: {0} has made a new link!
embed.link.description: [**Add TBH to your apps**]({0}) to send them anonymous messages.
embed.inbox.enable.title: Enabled inbox
embed.inbox.enable.description: You enabled your inbox. Use `/link` to notify your friends!
embed.inbox.disable.title: Disabled inbox
embed.tbh.help.title: How to use TBH
embed.tbh.help.description:
-Send anonymous messages to people with `/send message`
-Open up your inbox with `/link`
embed.see_origin.title: Message origin
embed.see_origin.unknown.description: Unknown origin. This is probably an error!
embed.see_origin.server.description: This message comes from a server.
embed.see_origin.group_chat.description: This message comes from a group chat.
embed.see_origin.direct_message.descript: This message comes from a DM. Good luck!
